languages.text: [draft]All targets within a cross-shaped area with a 1-cell radius around the target point suffer X {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} and must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} with a −2×X penalty. Creatures that fail the test become {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g} until the Psyker's next turn. In all the formulas, X equals the level of this {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g} granted by a psyker's stave.

traits.locale_text: [draft]All targets within a cross-shaped area with a 1-cell radius around the target point suffer X damage and must pass a Willpower test with a −2×X penalty. Creatures that fail the test become immobilised until the Psyker's next turn. In all the formulas, X equals the level of this psychic power granted by a psyker's stave.
